title: Beeping sound occurs when selecting SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText
description: In the SWT example ControlExample, when selecting the SWT.MULTI style in the Text tab, a beeping sound is heard. This behavior seems unexpected and should be addressed.
OB: When selecting the SWT.MULTI style in the Text tab of the ControlExample, a beeping sound is heard.
EB: When selecting the SWT.MULTI style in the Text tab of the ControlExample, no beeping sound should be heard.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the SWT example ControlExample.
2. Go to the Text tab.
3. Click on Styles SWT.SINGLE.
4. Click on Styles SWT.MULTI.
5. Observe if a beeping sound occurs.
